vocabulary.example: Proper nutrition is crucial for overall health.

vocabulary.definition: things that cause a response in a living organism
vocabulary.example: Different people react differently to the same stimuli.

vocabulary.definition: cells that carry electrical impulses throughout the body
vocabulary.example: Damage to nerve cells can lead to loss of sensation.

vocabulary.definition: persisting for a long time or constantly recurring
vocabulary.example: She has been dealing with chronic back pain for years.
His oversensitive nature makes him easily upset.
Her overactive imagination often leads to creative ideas.
